name: Melt Town
description:
The game represents the home of an Eskimo. The objective of the game is to save every animal in the map from drowning because the ice in which they live in is melting due to global warming. You have a limited amount of time to accomplish your goal; and you must be careful with the trash, since it will block your path.


Melt Town is a game done for the Global Game Jam January 2019 by 6 people.  All new to game development.
